extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     SPAN201 or SPAN205.
Exclusions    No more than 6.0 units from SPAN251; SPAN351; SPAN352.

basic.description: A survey of the major authors and works of Latin American literature from the beginning of the 20th century to the present. Readings will include texts from all genres and will illustrate the main cultural and historical trends and movements.
basic.subject: SPAN
basic.title: Panorama literario latinoaméricano II
